Blog.post: wow.. man.. check this out!! look what i have created. yes youre all special ur lucky enough to be able to read what it is that my special mind pops up at random times... for instance the fact that i have millions of these things and i have no idea how to work half of the magic :P hehe. newho.. im off now.. to see my page when im done typing my random stuff.. neways ya. hope ya read this.. im bored..and i miss amanda. hehehehehehehehehe L WORD. byeee
yes again. but it is my last day this week. and then its canadia day (woo not. god hate canada) then friday alex is coming over... ehehe.. i love him. well im off to watch ellen :D toodles!

mk yea this sucks. im babysiting.. n we gots alchis :D:D:D woooooo omg so cant type. muahahahahahaha lmfao kaylas droooooly my kitty died u guys :( this is homosexual. :( i want her back :( kayla says hi... shes spedcial. lmfao. k going to watch peter pan :D i love him lmao ben! wooo.byeness

well we came home.. then watched the tube. then made emmensly enormus lists of shit to get for highskool (dun dun dun) jess and i are going together on the 1st day bcuz were both scared shitless :( weep! then we read and talked.. then we played scrabble for EVER and wrote cunt and poon lmao. till 5 am. then mother made me come home at 1:30 damnit.. now im SUPER tired. well im off to get my freeze on lmao. byeee

lmao ok amanda and bekah cant track me here. so i shall no longer be xanga posting. only on blog. ps i LOVE alayna and lalexs blogs on lollerskating :D i shall be posting my comedic insanity bi lazily :D lmao annnyways. i miss people (jess, lalex, CHELLE, LAYNA) and cant wait for friday. partay :D ahahahha muahahahhaha. im having a sleepover at jessicas on friiiiday. and yay:D toodles for now. looooove muchly, tasha P.S. i love wonderland peter bill aunty and i had a blast. i heard bill scream like a girl. i shall leave u with these 3 HYSTERICAL quotes of last friday: "i think i got hit in the head with a quarter" "dude u guys almost lost ur hands" "needles are pointless"

LMFAO! srry. neways quebec was awesome!! wooo hoo. i had a blast (x10!) it was AWESOME. sooo many hot guys. and i dated john for all of monday night till this morning.and now i like dave, and ben, and kinda other people. and a little bit of john/alex.. AHHH shit too many. anyways amanda was nice ish. which is a bonus. woo. and i got new undies at la vie en rose. tres belle. and 2 new tummy button rings.:D annnnyways. im off to talk to dave... muchos amorez! tasha

well now isnt this fab? i am sooooo FREAKIN tired. went to laynas. we were up till like 6! lmfao i was like "ugh i am SO fat!!! *eats cake*" and i like 2 alexs at once *blushes* only one of them is my bf and one of them likes this amanda chick who ben was all lovey dovey with.. its gay amandas are life ruiners. that is my decision. annnyways im off to get clean etc. love lots. byeee

i think i may love dave.. i just dumped john. and i care about dave... but then alex really turns me on. like lots. and i crave doing something. and its not just a momentary thing either. its like the feeling that i want to do that thing just doesnt go away. like i want to do that thing. and that thing is not sex. but still... urgh.. so confused. toodles
ok.. not even close to packed.. 10 hours till leaving :| jeeeeeeesus!!!:|.. annnyways... i dont want to go.. people are gay... going to pack a little... after i change my template.. luv.. bye
at school!.. woooohooo.. going to lunch// much love../ bye

k so maybe amanda wasnt the friend i thought she was. maybe it just seemed like she was being my friend and inviting me over and going out 4 lunch with me and wanted to go on the trip with me and wanted to be on the bus with me. i am not a lesbian. and the only reason she hates me is because i hate bekah.. well she hates my good friend mel and i dont hate her for that!! so wtf. ugughghghghhg people!!! jesus. i just want to die. is that too much to ask? like helooooooo?????.. oh well... whatever.. if she wants to hate me for absolutely no reason and ruin a perfectly great friendship whatever. she can go live in her little world of pot (which by the way u CAN get addicted to. pay attention in health class bitch) ok so the long and short is i will most likely be sleeping on the floor in quebec because amanda hates me and is being absolutely retarded. so its gunna TOTALLY suck :|. i want my mommy :(. this blows. ughghghghg everytime i see her it makes me want to cry.. i cried a little today... so stupid. why cry over something like this?... maybe because she was (or so i thought)my best friend.. who was nice to me until friday. then hated me on saturday.. and now is calling me a lesbian. and dirty. and hates me. and she was my friend!!!!! it hurts :(. make it stop :(

well now.. hasnt this been fun? UGH this sucks. i want my best friend back :( damnit!!! ... meh... i spose thats what happens when u grow up... you lose everyone important to u.... im so lonely.. and confused. im gunna go..wallow in lonely self pity.. byeee:(

ya.. were not wiggers.. have no idea where the we be chillin came from.. gotta stop with the milk.. and maybe cut down on the midnight ice caps. annnnnnnnyways... yes... so i hate people.. (amanda, bekah, tom.. JUSTINE.. alison is such a biaaach and yes.) were gunna go for a walk after we talk to mels yummalicious bonable palys. much love entirely to u all from us ( IM THE BETTER HALF ahahahah) xo (not kisses.. something. not kisses.. mmm ben kisses)srry.. minorly off topic.. ahaha! bye :)

watsaaaaaap? me? NOTHING. jeeeesus murphy. im so fricking bored.. and i was forced to dance like all day.. and alex is being a prick.. so were like SO over. grrr. boys.. speaking of which.. i wore bens coat today.. mmm.. still smells like him.. and the strange thing was without realizing it i also wore the exact same outfit i had on the night i got it :S neways.. i want ben.. and in his msn name there is no more *heart* jessica... *pukes*.. that hurts the heart right there.. i mean sure i was dating alex but hes more of a fuck buddy whos infatuated with me.. cant see why.. seeing as im soo fucking ugly.. *shudders* aha inFATuated.. which is what i am.. FAT. woooooooo blowing off major friday steam.. well guess what peoples? i got paid today!!!!! i want to go buy shoes!!!! :D:D:D:Di love shoes. mm want spaghetti.. with ben.. because were both veggies.. how cute is that? and the palm reading stuff said we were a match. so like wtf.. why cant i have him? its for painting the stupid rosary and wearing it isnt it? fuck. oh well.. maybe my rollercoaster will hit a nice hill and stay atop for a nice while. mmk well im off to talk to ben.. do nice flirtys.. love him while hes oblivious. grr damnit.

ahahahah these work at school!!!! yaaaay. lets hope they dont find out or ill never be able to update! :( *weep*.. neways.. im working on this GAY french slideshow thingy and its taking FOREVER because i dont get it .. hehe im dumb newho ill write more at home.. where in gods name is amanda?!?! she promised shed be here. grr.. damn her!! neways yes im going now.. good bye.. i said GOOD BYE!! god.. u just cant get enough of me.. aha.. bye

ugh life sucks. is it ok to die now? goddamnit! i just got bitched at for never cleaning the house.. however mothers "fiance" does jack shit. i come home after being gone for a week and hes had a party and tells me to start cleaning. and shes bitching she has to do all the work well wtf are u on about.. ask your hubby to get off his lazy ass. every person in this house works and im here least of all so why the fuck should i have to vaccum HIS mess and clean the dishes HE makes. if it werent for him id never have to do dishes. asshole :( neways... im bored as hell. and i like too many people. i think im destined to be alone forever. fuuuuck. and alayna and alex kissed.. and alex and jason kissed.. and lalex and jason kissed. and now im jealous.. and sad.. and alone.. and going for some retail therapy with my sister.. but now i want pancakes reeeaaaally bad.*sigh* loves the funeral of hearts.. and a hope for cruelty when angels cry blood.......

yeeees this is interesting lmao. peter and i are talkin about dykes and ugliness. and now hot dogs lmao. ooh man lmfao! i miss my friends.. and guys. omg i met the HOTTEST guy today in bootlegger :D soo yummy and nice mmm lmao! well im off to see whos posting.. there is no msn here! how sad:( i got ver mail... she made it.. feeling icky but shes good!

ahahahah it kicks ass here!! there are TWO staircases. its awesome!!! and were 10 mins walking distance from upper canada mall :D. and peter plays bass and david plays drums and now i must buy a bass guitar. :D aahaha. if anyone talks to my beloved tell him im going insane without him :( and that i love him, i miss u guys tons and tons. love muchly
wow people are dumb. i have a new list of people to hate. but i wont bother it takes too long :| grrr... k going to talk to ben bcuz i loooooooove him... no alex.... oh god i dunno... gr
yes, i likes ben:D hes sooo yummy nummy mmmm i wants him. neways im getting a cell fone on saturday.. annnd im getting more SKOOL clothies :D bwahahahahahahahahaha.. well bye for now :D:D:D
